name: Hayabusa S4 PU Leather Boxing Gloves for Men, Women & Kids, 10oz, 12oz, 14oz, 16oz, Training, Sparring, Kickboxing, Fighting Sports, Taekwondo, MMA, Muay Thai & Arts
short_description: The information below is per-pack only

A NEW STANDARD FOR BEGINNER BOXING GLOVES: A boxing glove that checks all of the boxes, from protection and comfort to durability and fit. Comfortable and supportive the moment you put them on, featuring PU leather construction, nylon lining, and a mesh palm to ensure the S4 will stand up to high-intensity workouts week after week, month after month.
BUILT FOR COMFORT WITH A TAILORED FIT: The pre-curved ergonomic pocket, grip bar and proper thumb position ensure proper fist closure and alignment — sizes 10 oz 12 oz, 14 oz, and 16 oz.
SUPPORT YOU CAN TRUST: The single strap works in tandem with the splinted wrist support to deliver a secure, protective fit that prevents risky and damaging bends
PADDED KNUCKLE PROTECTION: Most starter gloves don’t fully protect your hands. S4 delivers splinted wrist support and cushioning foam to keep you properly protected while you hone your technique.
PACKAGE CONTENTS: 1 pair of S4 Boxing Gloves. S4 is perfect for training, sparring, kickboxing, combat sports, taekwondo, kickboxing, MMA, muay thai, and martial arts.
product_description: Hayabusa S4 Boxing Gloves Hayabusa S4 Boxing Gloves offer everything you need to begin your boxing journey. Perfect for bagwork and drills, this glove protects your knuckles and keeps you comfortable while you hone your technique. Splinted padding over your wrists provide support with a comfortable, natural fit while you train. S4 Boxing Gloves are ideal for beginners starting fitness classes, boxing, muay thai, kickboxing, and wherever else you need secure protection. Features: Splinted padding supports and aligns your wristsInjected-molded foam delivers shock absorbing knuckle protection Hand ergonomics and natural fit reduces hand strainMicrofiber thumb makes it easy to wipe away sweatUltra-smooth inner lining stays cool when your hands get hot

name: RDX Boxing Gloves, Pro Training Sparring, Maya Hide Leather, Muay Thai MMA Kickboxing, Men Women Adult, Heavy Punching Bag Focus Mitts Pads Workout, Ventilated Palm, Multi Layered, 8 10 12 14 16 18 Oz
short_description: EFFECTIVE IMPACT DISPERSION – Are your training gloves affecting your accuracy? The RDX gloves dissipate the force of impact across the specially made, pre-curved anatomical structure of the sparring gloves due to the presence of Quadro Dome 3 padding, which uses EVA foam and SpongeX sheet. This results in a comfortable training experience for the users of the RDX heavy boxing gloves.

PATENT PENDING LOMA TECH DESIGN – Do you face trouble forming the perfect fist, while using boxing gloves ? RDX gloves feature a PATENT PENDING single seamless LOMA Tech design used in the palm area and thumb of the boxing gloves. This helps create an improved alignment between the fist and thumb and along with an especially designed attached thumb allows the trainees to form the perfect fist and punch better with the training gloves.

EXCEPTIONALLY DURABLE MATERIAL – No matter how hard you punch these gloves make sure to outlast your intense training. The use of advanced caliber Maya Hide ConvEX Skin Leather in the KARA Series training gloves makes them durable and reliable for long-term use while also providing a superior look and feel during Boxing, Muay Thai, MMA, Kickboxing, and heavy bag training sessions among other similar sports.

FULL WRAPAROUND WRIST SUPPORT – A hassle-free design with sufficient support for your wrists. The hook and loop Fastener straps provide a secure fit and make it easy to put on or take off the kickboxing gloves for men and women along with providing better wrist support due to the full wraparound wrist strap, while the dual stitching in the heavy bag gloves makes them durable and resilient for extensive training sessions.

SWEAT-FREE EXPERIENCE – Bid farewell to those sweaty palms and hands. With multiple ventilation holes strategically placed in the thumb sections of the lightweight boxing gloves, RDX ensures proper airflow management so that its customers get a sweat-free experience. Furthermore, the advanced perforated sheet for breathable ventilation in the palm area is sweat-wicking and minimizes sweat accumulation.

POWER ALIGNED PUNCHES – The heavy punching bag gloves for women and men use DenZo-Tron Grip Bar in the upper palm area to allow the users to attain the optimal posture for powerful punches during training and competitions.

short_description: Modernized Powerlock Support System: The upgraded turnback strap tightens securely for a locked-in feel, giving athletes dependable wrist stability whether they're using these as boxing training gloves or versatile boxing equipment across different drills.

Quad-Layered Padding for Balanced Protection: Four layers of responsive foam help absorb impact for safer, more comfortable striking—ideal for fighters who rely on supportive punching gloves during bag sessions, pad rounds, or mitt work.

Durable High-Quality Synthetic Leather: Built from premium synthetic leather made to handle frequent training, these gloves provide long-lasting durability for athletes who want reliable bag gloves or everyday boxing gear.

Ergonomic Grip Bar & Secured Thumb: A reinforced grip bar and secured thumb help guide your hand into proper position, boosting control and reducing fatigue—perfect for athletes using punching bag gloves for bag work, pads, or training combos.

Mesh Palm & Soft Interior Lining: A full mesh palm increases ventilation while the polyester foam lining adds comfort, helping keep hands cooler and improving long-term wear for anyone using boxing bag gloves or training gloves during extended sessions.
product_description: The Everlast Powerlock 2 Boxing Gloves deliver upgraded protection and comfort for athletes of all experience levels. A quad-layered foam core disperses impact for more controlled striking, while the redesigned Powerlock turnback closure provides a secure wrist fit that supports proper technique. High-quality synthetic leather adds durability for long-term training, and the ergonomic grip bar helps maintain an efficient fist position for improved control during bag work, pad rounds, or mitt training. A full mesh palm enhances airflow, and the polyester foam interior lining adds lasting comfort through intense workouts. Built for athletes seeking dependable boxing equipment, these gloves perform well as boxing training gloves, punching gloves, or durable bag gloves suited for a wide variety of drills.
